properties.areaDesc: Washington, GA; Wilkinson, GA; Johnson, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 8:17PM EST until January 20 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Bibb...Houston...Jones...
Monroe and Twiggs Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Johnson...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties


...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
Oconee River near Oconee affecting Washington and Wilkinson
Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Oconee River near Oconee.
* Until Monday evening.
* At 745 PM Wednesday the stage was 19.4 feet, and rising.
* Minor flooding is occurring, and minor flooding is forecast to
continue.
* Flood stage is 17 feet.
* The river will continue rising, reaching near 20.5 feet by Saturday
morning. The river is expected to fall below flood stage Monday
afternoon.
* Between 19 and 21 feet, the water level floods portions of the dirt
parking lot near the Old Balls Ferry Road boat ramp, just upstream
and rightbank from the Georgia Highway 57 bridge. Minor flooding
continues to spread further into the woodlands near the river.

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until Monday evening
